metadata.synopsis: One-liner for Ma Festina, Civilian4 from the Eastway's Wizards Vignette.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to the civilian4 in the group of wizards and stragglers around the fountain nearby the Sorcerous Sundries.

0.speaker: Ma Festina
0.text: Just look at her, ha ha! She hasn't been this excited since her birthday!

1.speaker: Ma Festina
1.text: I've heard you're trouble. The kids here are enjoying themselves, so why don't you just... move along?

2.speaker: Ma Festina
2.text: Well! Fireworks for the kids, and then a local hero walks up! Quite a day.
